item.title: Setting Up Icarus Verilog on Google Colab
item.description: Google Colab is a cloud-based platform that allows you to run code in a Jupyter Notebook environment. While it’s primarily designed for Python, it can also be adapted to run Verilog simulations using Icarus Verilog.
